data.title: Tom Gores - phone & email - Platinum Equity - Chairman & Ceo
data.meta_description: Tom Gores - Chairman & Ceo - Platinum Equity - email id & phone of top management contacts like Founder, CEO, CFO, CMO, CTO, Marketing or HR or Finance head.
data.text:
Tom Gores

Tom Gores is the Chairman & Ceo of Platinum Equity. Platinum Equity is a Venture Capital & Private Equity company and has headquarters in Beverly Hills,ca. Platinum Equity has 363 employees. It was founded in 1995. Platinum Equity specialises in venture capital & private equity. Platinumequity.com is a privately held company. You can view Tom Gores contact number by clicking below.

Login/Signup to view number
